attributes.action: Parents should have the option weather to put their children in school or not
attributes.background: Parents should have the option to put their children in school or not due to bullying

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because its about something that the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for.

It's the responsibility of the school to decide whether an absence is justifiable or not.

The UK Government issues guidance to schools about absence due to bullying: 

https://assets.publishing.service.gov.uk/government/uploads/system/uploads/attachment_data/file/623895/Preventing_and_tackling_bullying_advice.pdf

You could start a new petition if you would like that guidance to be changed.
